verses.verse: And these<WH428> are the countries which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> inherited<WH5157> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> which<WH834> Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> distributed for inheritance<WH5157> to them.

By lot<WH1486> was their inheritance,<WH5159> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses,<WH4872> for the nine<WH8672> tribes,<WH4294> and for the half<WH2677> tribe.<WH4294>

For <WH3588> Moses<WH4872> had given<WH5414> the inheritance<WH5159> of two<WH8147> tribes<WH4294> and a half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> on the other side<WH4480> <WH5676> Jordan:<WH3383> but unto the Levites<WH3881> he gave<WH5414> none<WH3808> inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> them.

For <WH3588> the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> were<WH1961> two<WH8147> tribes,<WH4294> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim:<WH669> therefore they gave<WH5414> no<WH3808> part<WH2506> unto the Levites<WH3881> in the land,<WH776> save<WH3588> <WH518> cities<WH5892> to dwell<WH3427> in, with their suburbs<WH4054> for their cattle<WH4735> and for their substance.<WH7075>
As <WH834> the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> <WH853> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did,<WH6213> and they divided<WH2505> <WH853> the land.<WH776>

Then the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> came<WH5066> unto<WH413> Joshua<WH3091> in Gilgal:<WH1537> and Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite<WH7074> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Thou<WH859> knowest<WH3045> <WH853> the thing<WH1697> that<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> said<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> concerning<WH5921> <WH182> me and thee in Kadesh-barnea.<WH6947>

Forty <WH705> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> was I<WH595> when Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> sent<WH7971> me from Kadesh-barnea<WH4480> <WH6947> to espy out<WH7270> <WH853> the land;<WH776> and I brought<WH7725> him word<WH1697> again as<WH834> it was in<WH5973> mine heart.<WH3824>

Nevertheless my brethren<WH251> that<WH834> went up<WH5927> with<WH5973> me made<WH853> the heart<WH3820> of the people<WH5971> melt:<WH4529> but I<WH595> wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD<WH3068> my God.<WH430>

And Moses<WH4872> swore<WH7650> on that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> Surely<WH518> <WH3808> the land<WH776> whereon<WH834> thy feet<WH7272> have trodden<WH1869> shall be<WH1961> thine inheritance,<WH5159> and thy children's<WH1121> forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> because<WH3588> thou hast wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD<WH3068> my God.<WH430>

And now,<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> the LORD<WH3068> hath kept me alive,<WH2421> <WH853> as<WH834> he said,<WH1696> these<WH2088> forty<WH705> and five<WH2568> years,<WH8141> even since<WH4480> <WH227> the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> <WH853> this<WH2088> word<WH1697> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> while<WH834> the children of Israel<WH3478> wandered<WH1980> in the wilderness:<WH4057> and now,<WH6258> lo,<WH2009> I<WH595> am this day<WH3117> fourscore<WH8084> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old.<WH1121>

As yet<WH5750> I am as strong<WH2389> this day<WH3117> as<WH834> I was in the day<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> me: as my strength<WH3581> was then,<WH227> even so is my strength<WH3581> now,<WH6258> for war,<WH4421> both to go out,<WH3318> and to come in.<WH935>

Now <WH6258> therefore give<WH5414> me<WH853> this<WH2088> mountain,<WH2022> whereof<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> in that<WH1931> day;<WH3117> for<WH3588> thou<WH859> heardest<WH8085> in that<WH1931> day<WH3117> how<WH3588> the Anakims<WH6062> were there,<WH8033> and that the cities<WH5892> were great<WH1419> and fenced:<WH1219> if<WH194> so be the LORD<WH3068> will be with<WH854> me, then I shall be able to drive them out,<WH3423> as<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> said.<WH1696>
And Joshua<WH3091> blessed<WH1288> him, and gave<WH5414> unto Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> <WH853> Hebron<WH2275> for an inheritance.<WH5159>

Hebron <WH2275> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> became<WH1961> the inheritance<WH5159> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite<WH7074> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> because<WH3282> that<WH834> he wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

And the name<WH8034> of Hebron<WH2275> before<WH6440> was Kirjath-arba;<WH7153> which Arba was a great<WH1419> man<WH120> among the Anakims.<WH6062> And the land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> from war.<WH4480> <WH4421>
